meanings.definition: (解剖学)膝蓋骨の、膝蓋骨に関する
meanings.english_definition: (anatomy) Of or relating to the patella (kneecap).

examples.sentence: the rotular surface of the femur

etymology.value: From Latin 'rotula' (small wheel), referring to the shape of the patella.

inflection.notes: Adjective, so it can be used to modify nouns.
